column1: {"bio": "Nata\u0161a Pantovi\u0107 Nuit is a Maltese Serbian Author

column13: with Dr. Miomir Pantovi\u0107 [Dr Pantovic Worldcat Link]. In 2014 Nata\u0161a starts the Alchemy of Love Mindfulness Project and until 2017 publishes 9 Mindfulness Books.\r\n\r\nIn March 2014

The main interest is in areas of Mindfulness
column31: Vegetarian and Vegan Food and Nutrition
column32: and Conscious Parenting.\r\n\r\n> \"Self-development is a way of Life. Our Self-Development never ends. We are never too young or too old for personal growth. We have an amazing potential to reach our highest potential
